title: Construction or reconstruction of slums/buildings falling under Reservations contemplated in the DP shall be permissible as -stipulated in the Regulation No
clause_text: Construction or reconstruction of slums/buildings falling under Reservations contemplated in the DP shall be permissible as -stipulated in the Regulation No.17(3)(C)(I)
